com.smartthings.sdk.client.methods

Interface LocationsApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApiClient.Api

    public interface LocationsApi
extends ApiClient.Api

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • createLocation

        Location createLocation(java.lang.String authorization,
                        CreateLocationRequest createLocationRequest)
        Create a Location. Create a Location for a user. We will try and create the Location geographically close to the country code provided in the request body. If we do not support Location creation in the requested country code, then the API will return a 422 error response with an error code of UnsupportedGeoRegionError.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        createLocationRequest - (required)
        Returns:
        Location

      • deleteLocation

        DeleteLocationResponse deleteLocation(java.lang.String authorization,
                                      java.lang.String locationId)
        Delete a Location. Delete a Location from a user's account.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        locationId - The ID of the location. (required)
        Returns:
        DeleteLocationResponse

      • getLocation

        Location getLocation(java.lang.String authorization,
                     java.lang.String locationId)
        Get a Location. Get a specific Location from a user's account.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        locationId - The ID of the location. (required)
        Returns:
        Location

      • listLocations

        PagedLocations listLocations(java.lang.String authorization)
        List Locations. List all Locations currently available in a user account.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        Returns:
        PagedLocations

      • updateLocation

        Location updateLocation(java.lang.String authorization,
                        java.lang.String locationId,
                        UpdateLocationRequest updateLocationRequest)
        Update a Location. All the fields in the request body are optional. Only the specified fields will be updated.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        locationId - The ID of the location. (required)
        updateLocationRequest - (required)
        Returns:
        Location
